title: Teacher Shortages
description:
This week, Joe has strong opinions about the Grammar Police, Anna Delvey, merit pay, and how the teacher shortage has gotten to the point where the National Guard has been called on to help.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
